::Jhiaxus/Scorponok-Zarak::
   
  The two leave the shuttle. Jhiaxus takes some cover in a near marsh area. He hides deep in the weeds.
   
  Scorponok changes to scorpion mode and Zarak gets into the cockpit. The scorpion form burrows under the ground.

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:
          Shuttle:

Shuttle landes in the designed poin in Detroit and Hydras looking to 
All predacons said "Find a nice spot your our meetimg for Rodimus... 
Remember that you should be cover and at hand in order to capture him 
when he comes to rescued... his dearest drone"
